p: Data regarding scientific names of plants, botanical family, plant parts, country of plant origin, type of extracts, isolated compounds, inhibition diameter in millimeters (mm), MIC, and minimal bactericidal concentration (MBC) in Î¼g/ml were collected independently from each publication and captured using a standardized Word document form. The scientific names of the plants were checked with http://www.theplantlist.org. Botanical families follow APG IV system [ 22].
